Title: Balancing the Scales
Description:
The time for subtlety is over. Lord Hel'nurath has made himself known to us... and I will not rest until I see him slain.

<Maiev clenches her teeth.>

Ready yourself, $n. Together we will show these demons why they should fear the kaldorei.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Maiev Shadowsong in the depths of Shadow Hold
